ProjectTitle: Microglia/neuron-overspraak bij autismespectrumstoornis: de rol van vroege ontstekingsactivatie (MINERVA)
InitialFeedbackHistory:
07/02/2023
Please note that storing data on hard drives only is not very safe, have a look at the storage guide for alternatives: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Please note that KU Leuven also has a data repository RDR that you can consider to use for data sharing: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
